title: Adapters
head: /APIs
paragraph: Connectors of the app with the external services; axios, baseURL, AJAX, XHR

title: il8n
head: Internationalization
paragraph: takes care of the language support of the application

title: Assets
head: Media
paragraph: This folder contains all the media assets, such as images, videos, json files

title: HOC
head: Higher Order Components
paragraph: Extract the logic in single place and share it across many components.

title: Containers
head: Stateful Components
paragraph: the components which have a direct subscription to the state of the app, likely a store. These components have access to the values in the state

title: Components
head: Presentational/Stateless Components
paragraph: the components who have an indirect access/subscription to the state of the app. They are used only to display information passed through props

title: Store
head: State Management
paragraph: In large applications where there is a lot of information to be stored and managed in state, it is preferable to use global state or a store.

title: Utils
head: Context & Custom Hook
paragraph: The context which has to be shared across these components. Each page can have several nested contexts. And Hooks lets you extract component logic into reusable functions
